Huge Army Bharti 2026: Agniveer Rally for 25,000+ Posts – Online Form Started




By Mukesh Tandi



|



22 February, 2026






Join WhatsApp



Join Now




			
				
					
											
										Agniveer Rally Recruitment 2026 Details
				

				
											
							
															
							
								Job Post
								25,000+ (Expected)
							
						
											
							
															
							
								Qualification
								8th / 10th / 12th Pass
							
						
											
							
															
							
								Age Limit
								Minimum Age 17½ Years or Maximum Age 22 Years
							
						
											
							
															
							
								Last Apply Date
								01-Apr-2026
							
						
											
							
															
							
								Application Fee
								₹250
							
						
									
			
			




The Indian Army has officially released the notification for Agniveer Rally 2026 under the Agnipath Scheme, inviting applications from eligible and aspiring candidates across the country. This recruitment drive offers a golden opportunity for young individuals who wish to serve the nation and build a career in the armed forces. Interested candidates can submit their online application forms through the official website, joinindianarmy.nic.in, within the prescribed dates.



The recruitment process will be conducted for multiple posts including General Duty (GD), Tradesman, Clerk, Technical, and other categories. Applicants are advised to carefully check the eligibility criteria, age limit, educational qualifications, physical standards, and selection process details mentioned in the official notification before applying.




Table of ContentsIndian Army Agniveer Rally 2026 – OverviewHeight Relaxation (4 cm)Important Note for CandidatesIndian Army Agniveer Rally Important Links￼




Indian Army Agniveer Rally 2026 – Overview



ParticularsDetailsRecruiting AuthorityIndian ArmyPost NameAgniveer (GD, Tradesman, Clerk & Others)Total Vacancies25,000+ (Expected)Application ModeOnlineStart Date to Apply13 February 2026Last Date to Apply01 April 2026Exam ModeOnline Common Entrance Exam (CEE)Official Websitehttps://www.joinindianarmy.nic.in



Indian Army Agniveer Rally Salary Structure



YearMonthly Salary1st Year₹30,0002nd Year₹33,0003rd Year₹36,5004th Year₹40,000



Additional Benefits: Selected Agniveer Rally will not only receive an attractive salary package but also enjoy several additional benefits as per Army rules and service conditions. These include Risk & Hardship Allowance for serving in challenging and high-altitude areas, free Ration facilities, and Dress Allowance to maintain required uniforms and standards. In addition, candidates will be entitled to Travel Allowance (as applicable) for official duties and movement during service.



These benefits ensure financial security, operational support, and overall welfare while serving in the prestigious Indian Army.



Indian Army Agniveer Rally Details 2026



Post CategoryVacanciesAgniveer GDIncludedAgniveer TradesmanIncludedAgniveer ClerkIncludedAgniveer TechnicalIncludedSoldier Pharma & OthersIncludedTotal25,000+ (Expected)



Educational Qualification



PostQualificationAgniveer GD / TradesmanClass 8th / 10th PassClerk / Technical12th PassMinimum Marks45% aggregate & 33% in each subject (10th)Indian GorkhasSimple Class 10th Pass



Note: Candidates awaiting Class 10 results may apply but must produce marksheets in Phase II.



Age Limit (As per Notification)



CriteriaAgeMinimum Age17½ YearsMaximum Age22 YearsDate of Birth Range01 July 2005 to 01 July 2009Widow Defence PersonnelUpper age relaxable up to 30 years



Indian Army Agniveer Rally Physical Standards



ParameterRequirementHeight162 cmChest ExpansionMinimum 5 cmWeightAs per BMI chart



Height Relaxation (4 cm)




North East Region



Gorkhas



Garhwalis



Ladakh Region



Recognized Tribal Areas




Indian Army Agniveer Rally Application Fee



CategoryFeeAll Candidates₹250Payment ModeOnline



Important Dates – Indian Army Agniveer Rally 2026



EventDateOnline Application Start13 February 2026Last Date to Apply01 April 2026Online CEE Exam01–15 June 2026 (Tentative)Rally Phase IITo be Notified



Selection Process



StageDetailsPhase IOnline Common Entrance Exam (CEE)Phase IIRecruitment RallyTests at RallyPFT, PMT, Medical, Document VerificationFinal SelectionMerit-Based



Physical Fitness Test (PFT) Details



TestStandard1.6 Km Run≤ 7 min 45 sec (Excellent)7:46 – 8:30 (Good)Long Jump10 Feet (Qualifying)High Jump3 Feet (Qualifying)



Extra time and relaxation applicable for hilly regions.



Medical Standards



RequirementDetailsPhysical & Mental HealthMust be fitDisabilitiesNot permittedMedical TestAs per Army standards



Documents Required (Phase II Rally)



Mandatory DocumentsAdmit Card20 Passport Size PhotosEducational CertificatesDomicile CertificateCaste Certificate (if applicable)Character CertificateNCC / Sports Certificate (if any)Aadhaar, PAN & Bank DetailsPolice Verification FormAffidavit (₹10 Stamp Paper)



How to Apply Online for Indian Army Agniveer Rally 2026




Visit www.joinindianarmy.nic.in



Register as a new user or login



Fill the online application form carefully



Upload documents, photo & signature



Pay ₹250 application fee online



Submit and download application form




Important Note for Candidates




Selection is 100% merit-based



No bribe or agent required



Indian Army recruitment is fair & transparent



Avoid frauds posing as recruiting agents




Indian Army Agniveer Rally Important Links






Official Notification PDF



Download









Official Website



Apply Now








Agniveer Rally, Army Bharti, Indian Army

								Vacancies
								Apprentice

								Application Fee
								₹100/-
							
						
									
			
			




The RRC Western Railway Apprentice Recruitment 2026 notification has been officially released by the Railway Recruitment Cell, Western Railway (RRC WR). According to the notification released on 18 February 2026, a total of 5349 ITI Apprentice vacancies are available under Advertisement No. RRC/WR/04/2025.




Table of ContentsRRC WR Apprentice Recruitment 2026 – OverviewRRC Western Railway ITI Apprentice Vacancy 2026 – Trade-wise DetailsEligibility CriteriaAge LimitSelection ProcessImportant DatesHow to Apply for RRC Western Railway Apprentice Recruitment 2026Important Links for RRC Western Railway Apprentice




Candidates who have passed 10th class with at least 50% marks and hold an ITI certificate in the relevant trade are eligible to apply for this recruitment. Interested applicants can submit their applications online through the official website www.rrc-wr.com.



The online application process started on 21 February 2026 and will remain open until 23 March 2026. Candidates are advised to complete their registration before the deadline.



RRC WR Apprentice Recruitment 2026 – Overview



ParticularsDetailsOrganizationWestern Railway (RRC WR)Post NameApprenticeAdvertisement No.RRC/WR/04/2025Total Vacancies5349Qualification10th Pass + ITIAge Limit15–24 YearsNotification Date18 February 2026Start Date to Apply21 February 2026Last Date to Apply23 March 2026Application ModeOnlineJob TypeApprenticeship (Contract)Official Websitewww.rrc-wr.com



RRC Western Railway ITI Apprentice Vacancy 2026 – Trade-wise Details



TradeVacanciesFitter1614Electrician1217Welder532PASAA280Electronic Mechanic236Mechanic (Diesel)207Painter190Carpenter184Refrigerator (AC Mechanic)184Pipe Fitter176Plumber136Wireman126Draftsman (Civil)87Turner75Stenographer40Machinist (Grinder)25Forger & Heat Treater16Machinist14Mechanic Motor Vehicle10Total5349



Eligibility Criteria



Educational Qualification



Candidates applying for Western Railway Apprentice Recruitment 2026 must fulfill the following educational qualifications:




Must have passed 10th Class (Matriculation) under the 10+2 system with at least 50% aggregate marks.



Candidates must possess an ITI certificate in the relevant trade from a recognized institute.




Trade-wise ITI Requirement



Applicants must hold an ITI certificate in the relevant trade such as:




Fitter – ITI in Fitter



Electrician – ITI in Electrician



Welder – ITI in Welder



COPA / PASAA – ITI in Computer Operator & Programming Assistant



Diesel Mechanic – ITI in Diesel Mechanic



Draftsman (Civil) – ITI in Draftsman (Civil)




Other trades should also match the respective ITI qualification as mentioned in the official notification.



Age Limit



As per the official notification, the age limit for RRC Western Railway Apprentice Recruitment 2026 is:




Minimum Age: 15 Years



Maximum Age: 24 Years




Age Relaxation



CategoryRelaxationSC / ST5 YearsOBC3 YearsPwBD10 YearsEx-ServicemenAs per Railway rules



Application Fee



CategoryFeeGeneral / OBC₹100SC / ST / PwBD / WomenNo Fee



Payment Mode: Online







Selection Process



The selection process for RRC Western Railway ITI Apprentice Recruitment 2026 will be completely merit-based.



✔ No written examination✔ No interview



Selection will be based on:




Average percentage of marks in 10th and ITI



Equal weightage given to both qualifications




Tie-breaking Criteria



If two candidates obtain the same marks:




The older candidate will be given preference.



If the date of birth is the same, the candidate who passed 10th earlier will be preferred.




Stipend



Selected candidates will undergo 1-year apprenticeship training and will receive a stipend according to the rules of the Railway Board and Apprentices Act guidelines.



Important Dates



EventDateNotification Release18 February 2026Start of Online Application21 February 2026Last Date to Apply23 March 2026



How to Apply for RRC Western Railway Apprentice Recruitment 2026



Candidates can apply online by following the steps below:




Visit the official website www.rrc-wr.com



Click on Apprentice Recruitment 2026



Register and fill out the application form



Upload photograph, signature, and required documents



Pay the application fee (if applicable)



Review the application form carefully



Submit the form and download the confirmation page




Important Links for RRC Western Railway Apprentice






Official Notification



Download









Apply Online



Apply Now









Official Website



Apply Now

The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has released the official RBI Assistant Notification 2026 on 16 February 2026. Through this recruitment drive, a total of 650 Assistant vacancies will be filled in various RBI offices across the country. Candidates can check the detailed notification on the official website rbi.org.in.




Table of ContentsRBI Vacancy 2026 – Office-wise BreakdownRBI Assistant Recruitment 2026: Eligibility CriteriaEducational QualificationAge LimitRBI Assistant Recruitment 2026: Apply OnlineWhy RBI Assistant 2026 Is a Top Government Job Opportunity





The online application process has already started, and interested candidates can submit their applications until 8 March 2026. Applicants are advised to complete the application form before the last date to avoid any last-minute issues.




To be eligible for this recruitment, candidates must have a Bachelor’s degree with at least 50% marks from a recognized university. The age limit for applicants is 20 to 28 years.



The RBI vacancy 2026 is considered a great opportunity for candidates who are preparing for government jobs in the banking sector. Eligible candidates should apply online within the given deadline.Here is a quick overview of the recruitment:



ParticularsDetailsConducting BodyReserve Bank of India (RBI)Post NameAssistantTotal Vacancies650Notification Release Date16 February 2026Application Start Date16 February 2026Application Last Date8 March 2026Exam LevelNationalExam FrequencyYearlySelection ProcessPrelims, Mains, Language Proficiency TestExam DurationPrelims: 60 min, Mains: 135 minJob LocationAcross IndiaOfficial Websiterbi.org.in



RBI Assistant Vacancy 2026: Category & Office-wise Distribution



The 650 vacancies for RBI Assistant 2026 have been distributed among different RBI regional offices across the country. These posts are also divided category-wise as per government reservation rules, including SC, ST, OBC, EWS, UR, PwBD, and Ex-Servicemen categories.



RBI Vacancy 2026 – Office-wise Breakdown

RBI Assistant Recruitment 2026: Eligibility Criteria



Candidates who wish to apply for RBI Assistant Recruitment 2026 must meet the required educational qualification and age criteria set by the Reserve Bank of India. Applicants who do not fulfill these conditions will not be considered for the recruitment process.



Educational Qualification



To apply for the RBI Assistant post, candidates must have completed a Bachelor’s degree in any discipline from a recognized university.General category candidates should have secured at least 50% marks in graduation, while candidates belonging to SC, ST, and PwBD categories are allowed to apply with pass marks, as per RBI guidelines.



Age Limit



The minimum age required is 20 years, while the maximum age limit is 28 years as per the notification. However, candidates belonging to reserved categories such as SC, ST, OBC, and others will receive age relaxation according to government rules.



RBI Assistant Recruitment 2026: Apply Online



The online application process for RBI Assistant 2026 started on 16 February 2026 on the official RBI website. Interested and eligible candidates should submit their applications as early as possible to avoid any technical problems near the deadline.



📌 Last Date to Apply Online: 8 March 2026



Apart from the application form, candidates can also download important documents from the official RBI website, including the RBI Assistant Notification 2026 PDF and previous year question papers to help with their exam preparation.



Selection Process for RBI Assistant 2026



The recruitment process consists of:




Preliminary Examination



Main Examination



Language Proficiency Test (LPT)




Final selection will be based on performance in the Mains exam and LPT, subject to eligibility verification.



Why RBI Assistant 2026 Is a Top Government Job Opportunity




Prestigious career with India’s central bank



Stable job with attractive salary and allowances



Pan-India posting opportunities



Excellent work-life balance

By Mukesh Tandi

23 February, 2026






Join WhatsApp



Join Now




			
				
					
											
										SBI SCO Vacancy Detail:
				

				
											
							
															
							
								Vacancies
								Specialist Cadre Officers
							
						
											
							
															
							
								Salary
								₹64,820 – ₹93,960 Approx
							
						
											
							
															
							
								Job Post
								116
							
						
											
							
															
							
								Age Limit
								21 to 45 years
							
						
											
							
															
							
								Last Apply Date
								15-Mar-2026
							
						
											
							
															
							
								Application Fee
								750/-
							
						
									
			
			




The State Bank of India (SBI) has released a notification for the SBI SCO Vacancy (Specialist Cadre Officers) 2026 under Advertisement No. CRPD/SCO/2025-26/27. Through this recruitment drive, SBI aims to fill 116 vacancies for experienced professionals in the fields of IS Audit and Chartered Accountancy. These positions are available on both regular and contractual basis.




Table of ContentsSBI SCO Vacancy 2026 – OverviewImportant DatesSBI SCO Vacancy 2026 DetailsSBI SCO Eligibility CriteriaWork Experience (Post Qualification)Age Limit (As on 31.01.2026)SBI SCO Pay Scale / CTCSBI SCO Selection ProcessApplication FeeImportant Links




The online application process began on 23 February 2026 and interested candidates can submit their applications until 15 March 2026. Eligible candidates need to apply online through the official SBI website sbi.co.in.



SBI SCO Vacancy 2026 – Overview



ParticularsDetailsOrganizationState Bank of India (SBI)Advertisement No.CRPD/SCO/2025-26/27Total Vacancies116PostsAVP (IS Audit), Deputy Manager (IS Audit), Deputy Manager (CA – Internal Audit)Job TypeRegular / ContractualApplication ModeOnlineSelection ProcessShortlisting & InterviewJob LocationMumbai / Hyderabad / Circle Audit Offices / Mobile DutyOfficial Websitesbi.co.in



Important Dates



EventDateNotification Release23 February 2026Online Application Start23 February 2026Last Date to Apply15 March 2026Cut-off Date for Eligibility31 January 2026



SBI SCO Vacancy 2026 Details



🔹 Assistant Vice President (IS Audit) – Contractual



TypeVacanciesRegular6Backlog6Total12



🔹 Deputy Manager (IS Audit) – Regular (MMGS-II)



TypeVacanciesRegular40Backlog3Total43



🔹 Deputy Manager (Chartered Accountant – Internal Audit) – Regular (MMGS-II)



TypeVacanciesRegular57Backlog4Total61



PwBD reservations are applicable as per RPWD Act 2016.



SBI SCO Eligibility Criteria



Candidates applying for the SBI SCO Vacancy 2026 must meet the required educational qualifications and work experience as specified by the State Bank of India.



📌 Educational Qualification (As on 31 January 2026)



AVP (IS Audit) & Deputy Manager (IS Audit)Candidates should have one of the following qualifications:




BE / B.Tech / B.Sc in Computer Science, IT, or Electronics with at least 50% marks



BCA or MCA



M.Tech or M.Sc in a relevant field




Preferred Certifications:CISA, CISSP, CISM, DISA, CEH, ISO 27001 Lead Auditor, or GIAC certification.



Deputy Manager (CA – Internal Audit)Candidates must be a Chartered Accountant (CA) with an active membership of ICAI.



Preferred Certifications:CISA or DISA.



Work Experience (Post Qualification)




AVP (IS Audit): Minimum 6 years of experience, including 3 years in IS Audit or Cyber Security Audit.



Deputy Manager (IS Audit): Minimum 3 years of experience, including 2 years in IS Audit or Cyber Security Audit.



Deputy Manager (CA – Internal Audit): At least 1 year of experience in bank audits.




📌 Note: Teaching or training experience will not be considered as valid work experience for the SBI SCO Vacancy 2026. Only relevant professional experience in the required field will be counted.



Age Limit (As on 31.01.2026)



PostAge LimitAVP27–45 yearsDM (IS Audit)25–35 yearsDM (CA – Internal Audit)21–35 years



SBI SCO Age Relaxation



Candidates applying for the SBI SCO Vacancy 2026 are eligible for age relaxation as per government rules:




SC / ST: 5 years



OBC (Non-Creamy Layer): 3 years



PwBD Candidates: Up to 15 years, depending on the category.




SBI SCO Pay Scale / CTC



The salary offered under the SBI SCO Recruitment 2026 varies according to the post:




AVP (IS Audit): Up to ₹50 Lakhs CTC per year (85% Fixed + 15% Variable pay).



Deputy Manager (Regular Posts): ₹64,820 – ₹93,960 plus admissible allowances as per bank rules.




Probation Period (Regular Posts):Selected candidates for regular posts will be on 1 year probation.



SBI SCO Selection Process



The selection process for the SBI SCO Vacancy 2026 will be conducted in the following stages:




✔ Shortlisting of candidates based on eligibility and experience



✔ Interview (Total 100 marks)



✔ CTC Negotiation (Applicable for AVP posts)



✔ Document Verification



✔ Medical Examination




❌ There will be no written examination for this recruitment.



📧 Interview call letters will be sent to candidates through email only.



Application Fee



CategoryFeeGeneral / EWS / OBC₹750SC / ST / PwBDNil



Fee is non-refundable.



How to Apply for SBI SCO Recruitment 2026



Candidates who want to apply for the SBI SCO Vacancy 2026 can follow the steps below to complete the online application process:



1️⃣ Visit the official SBI careers page: sbi.co.in/web/careers/current-openings2️⃣ Register yourself and fill out the online application form.3️⃣ Upload the required documents such as photograph, signature, resume, educational certificates, experience certificates, and salary slips.4️⃣ Pay the application fee online through the available payment methods.5️⃣ Review the details, submit the application, and print the confirmation page for future reference.



📌 Note: If a candidate submits multiple applications, only the last successfully submitted application will be considered valid.



How to Apply for SBI SCO Recruitment 2026



Candidates who want to apply for the SBI SCO Vacancy 2026 can follow the steps below to complete the online application process:



1️⃣ Visit the official SBI careers page: sbi.co.in/web/careers/current-openings2️⃣ Register yourself and fill out the online application form.3️⃣ Upload the required documents such as photograph, signature, resume, educational certificates, experience certificates, and salary slips.4️⃣ Pay the application fee online through the available payment methods.5️⃣ Review the details, submit the application, and print the confirmation page for future reference.



📌 Note: If a candidate submits multiple applications, only the last successfully submitted application will be considered valid.



Why Apply for SBI SCO 2026?



There are several reasons why professionals may consider applying for the SBI SCO Recruitment 2026:




Opportunity to work with India’s largest public sector bank



High salary package (up to ₹50 lakh CTC for AVP posts)



No written examination in the selection process



Excellent opportunity for fast-track professional career growth in the banking sector.

RRB Assistant Loco Pilot (ALP) Recruitment 2026–27: 11,127 Assistant Loco Pilot Vacancies Approved



The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has approved 11,127 vacancies for the post of RRB Assistant Loco Pilot (ALP) for the 2026–27 recruitment cycle. This is expected to be one of the largest technical recruitment drives in Indian Railways in the coming year.




Table of ContentsRRB ALP 2026–27: Recruitment OverviewOfficial Railway Board OrderRRB ALP Vacancy 2026–27: Zone-Wise DistributionRRB ALP 2026 Selection ProcessImportant LinksFinal Update




According to the official information, the approval has been issued through Railway Board letter No. 2026(E/MPP)/25/13/ALP dated 19 February 2026. The vacancies will be filled through a Centralised Employment Notification (CEN) 2026, which will be released by the Railway Recruitment Board.



These posts will be distributed across 17 Zonal Railways and CLW (Chittaranjan Locomotive Works). Once the notification is released, eligible candidates will be able to apply online through the respective RRB websites.



The recruitment will provide a great opportunity for candidates who have completed 10th along with ITI or a Diploma in relevant trades. Since ALP is a technical position in Indian Railways, candidates with the required technical qualifications can apply and secure a stable government job with good salary and benefits.







RRB ALP 2026–27: Recruitment Overview



ParticularsDetailsPost NameRRB Assistant Loco Pilot (ALP)Total Vacancies11,127Approval Date19 February 2026Reference No.2026(E/MPP)/25/13/ALPRecruitment Year2026–27Pay LevelLevel-2 (7th CPC)Recruiting AuthorityRRBs under Ministry of Railways



Official Railway Board Order



The Railway Board, New Delhi has reviewed the vacancy positions submitted by different Zonal Railways through the Indent Management Module of HRMS. After examining the requirements, the board has approved filling a large number of posts for the RRB Assistant Loco Pilot (ALP) position.



As per the order, the competent authority has given approval to release a Centralised Employment Notification (CEN) for the recruitment of 11,127 ALP posts across various Zonal Railways and Chittaranjan Locomotive Works (CLW).



📌 Important: At present, this is only an approval order issued by the Railway Board. The detailed recruitment notification (CEN 2026), which will include eligibility criteria, application dates, and the selection process, has not been released yet. Candidates will be able to apply only after the official notification is published by the Railway Recruitment Board (RRB).



RRB ALP Vacancy 2026–27: Zone-Wise Distribution



Zonal RailwayVacanciesCentral Railway1400East Central Railway700East Coast Railway1625Eastern Railway608North Central Railway457North Eastern Railway105Northeast Frontier Railway1276Northern Railway740North Western Railway600South Central Railway674South East Central Railway200South Eastern Railway1531Southern Railway250South Western Railway200West Central Railway541Western Railway214CLW06Total11,127



RRB ALP 2026 Selection Process



The RRB Assistant Loco Pilot (ALP) Recruitment 2026 will follow a multi-stage selection process to shortlist eligible candidates. Applicants must clear each stage to move to the next phase of recruitment.




CBT 1 (Computer Based Test – Stage 1)




This is the first stage of the recruitment process and acts as a screening examination. It consists of objective-type questions. Candidates who qualify in CBT 1 will become eligible to appear for the next stage.



CBT 2 (Computer Based Test – Stage 2)



Candidates who clear CBT 1 will be called for CBT 2, which is a more advanced technical examination. This stage focuses on domain-related subjects and generally has a higher difficulty level.



CBAT (Computer-Based Aptitude Test)



The Computer-Based Aptitude Test is specifically conducted for RRB Assistant Loco Pilot posts. Performance in this test plays an important role as its marks are considered while preparing the final merit list.



Document Verification (DV)



Candidates who qualify in the previous stages will be invited for Document Verification, where their educational certificates, identity documents, and other eligibility proofs will be checked.



Medical Examination (ME)



Finally, candidates must pass the Railway medical examination, which follows strict medical standards required for safety-sensitive railway jobs.



Only candidates who successfully clear all stages of the selection process will be considered for final appointment as RRB Assistant Loco Pilots in Indian Railways.



Important Links






Notification PDF



Download






What This Means for Candidates



The approval of 11,127 RRB Assistant Loco Pilot (ALP) posts brings good news for railway job aspirants. It indicates that a large recruitment drive will soon be conducted by the Railway Recruitment Board.



Key points for candidates:



✔ Vacancies have already been officially approved by the Railway Board✔ It is expected to be one of the biggest ALP recruitments in recent years✔ A Centralised Employment Notification (CEN 2026) will be released soon✔ Candidates will be able to select their preferred railway zone while applying



The upcoming CEN 2026 notification will provide complete details regarding:




Eligibility criteria



Age limit



Trade-wise qualification (10th + ITI / Diploma)



Exam pattern and syllabus



Online application start and last dates




Why RRB ALP 2026 Is a Major Opportunity



The RRB Assistant Loco Pilot post in Indian Railways is considered a highly sought-after technical government job. Some of the main advantages include:




Level-2 pay scale under the 7th Central Pay Commission (CPC)



Stable government job with allowances and benefits



Career growth opportunities, including promotion to Loco Pilot



Recruitment conducted across multiple railway zones in India




Final Update



The approval of 11,127 RRB Assistant Loco Pilot vacancies clearly signals a major recruitment drive by Indian Railways for 2026–27. Candidates who are planning to apply should begin their preparation early, especially for CBT 1, CBT 2, and the CBAT, as the competition for railway jobs is expected to be high.



Aspirants are advised to keep an eye out for the official RRB Assistant Loco Pilot (ALP) CEN 2026 notification, which will soon be released and will officially start the online application process.





Loco Pilot, Railway, RRB

RRB Group D Railway Recruitment 2026 for 21,997 Posts




By Mukesh Tandi



|



19 February, 2026






Join WhatsApp



Join Now




			
				
					
											
										RRB Detail:
				

				
											
							
															
							
								Job Post
								21997
							
						
											
							
															
							
								Qualification
								10th Class
							
						
											
							
															
							
								Age Limit
								18 to 33 years
							
						
											
							
															
							
								Last Apply Date
								02-Mar-2026
							
						
											
							
															
							
								Application Fee
								250 to 500 Rupees
							
						
									
			
			




RRB Group D Online Application 2026: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has officially launched the online application process for 21,997 Group D (Level-1) positions. The application link is now active on the official website, rrbapply.gov.in, starting from January 31, 2026.



The RRB Group D recruitment aims to fill critical positions within the Indian Railways, providing ample opportunities for job seekers across the nation. The recruitment process includes various stages, including written examinations, physical efficiency tests, and document verification. The RRB’s commitment to transparency and fairness ensures that candidates are selected based on merit.




Table of ContentsFinal Thoughts on Railway Recruitment group d vacancy 2026RRB Group D Online Form 2026 – Important DatesImportant Links




Eligible candidates who have completed Class 10 and meet the necessary age, eligibility, and medical requirements are invited to submit their applications online before the deadline.



Steps to Apply Online for RRB Group D 2026Before applying, candidates must check eligibility, age limit, and medical standards.



Understanding the application process is vital for applicants. Each step plays a critical role in ensuring that candidates are adequately prepared and that their applications are submitted successfully. From registration to document submission, having a clear roadmap can significantly enhance the chances of securing a position.



Step 1: Registration




Visit rrbapply.gov.in



Select your respective RRB region



Click on “CEN-09/2025 Group D (Level-1) Recruitment”



Enter basic details such as name, DOB, mobile number, and email ID



Receive your Registration ID & Password via SMS/Email




Step 2: Fill Application Form




Login using your registration credentials



Enter personal, educational, and contact details carefully




Step 3: Upload Documents




Photograph: 35mm × 45mm, JPG/JPEG, 15–40 KB



Signature: JPG/JPEG, 10–20 KB



Category Certificate: JPG/JPEG, 50–100 KB




When filling out the application form, candidates should double-check all entered information to avoid common mistakes that could lead to disqualification. This includes ensuring that personal details, educational qualifications, and contact information are accurate and up-to-date.



Step 4: Pay Application Fee




SC / ST / Ex-Servicemen / Female / Transgender / Minority / EBC: ₹250



All Other Candidates: ₹500




📌 Fee Refund Policy:




₹400 refunded to General/Others after appearing in CBT



Full ₹250 refunded to SC/ST/Female/EBC after CBT



Payment Modes: Debit Card / Credit Card / Net Banking / UPI




Step 5: Final Submit



Uploading the correct documents is crucial. Candidates are advised to follow the guidelines provided for document specifications carefully. This includes checking the resolution and size of scanned images to ensure compliance with the application requirements.




Review all details carefully



Submit the application form



Download and print the confirmation page




Documents Required for RRB Group D Apply Online 2026



Failing to pay the application fee on time can lead to the rejection of the application. Candidates should prioritize this step and explore all available payment methods to determine which is most convenient for them.




Valid Mobile Number & Email ID (OTP verified)



Scanned photograph & signature



10th Class (Matriculation) Certificate



SC/ST Certificate (for free travel pass, if applicable)




Who Can Apply for RRB Group D Recruitment 2026?




Educational Qualification: Class 10 pass or equivalent



Age Limit: 18 to 33 years



Nationality: Indian citizen (as per RRB rules)



Must meet medical & physical standards



Candidates awaiting results are not eligible




Final Thoughts on Railway Recruitment group d vacancy 2026



The RRB Group D recruitment process is not just a gateway to a job; it is an opportunity to serve in one of the largest and most crucial sectors of the Indian economy. Candidates are encouraged to approach each stage of the recruitment with diligence and preparation, ensuring they maximize their chances of success.



In conclusion, understanding the entire recruitment process, eligibility criteria, application deadlines, and the importance of document verification can significantly impact the outcomes for applicants. With 21,997 posts available, this is a significant opportunity for job seekers aiming to establish a career in the Indian Railways.

By Mukesh Tandi



|

Join WhatsApp



Join Now




			
				
					
											
										Western Railway Vacancy Details:
				

				
											
							
															
							
								Job Post
								5349
							
						
											
							
															
							
								Qualification
								10th + ITI
							
						
											
							
															
							
								Age Limit
								15–24 Years
							
						
											
							
															
							
								Last Apply Date
								23-Mar-2026
							
						
									
			
			




The Western Railway vacancy, under the Railway Recruitment Cell, Western Railway (RRC WR), has officially released the Western Railway Vacancy Notification 2026 on 18 February 2026. As per Advertisement No. RRC/WR/04/2025, a total of 5349 Apprentice vacancies have been announced for engagement in various trades across different divisions, workshops and units of Western Railway.




Table of ContentsWestern Railway Vacancy 2026 – OverviewWestern Railway Recruitment 2026 – Trade-wise PostsEligibility CriteriaAge Limit (As per Notification)Age RelaxationApplication FeeImportant DatesHow to Apply for Western Railway Vacancy 2026




This recruitment drive is being conducted to provide apprenticeship training to eligible ITI qualified candidates under the Apprentices Act, 1961. Through this training programme, selected candidates will get an opportunity to learn practical and technical skills in railway establishments and gain valuable work experience in their respective trades. It is an excellent opportunity for candidates seeking career exposure and hands-on training in the Indian Railways sector.



Candidates are advised to carefully read the official notification and ensure that they meet all eligibility conditions before submitting the online application form. Any incorrect information or incomplete application may lead to rejection at any stage of the recruitment process.



Candidates who have passed 10th (Matriculation) with at least 50% aggregate marks and possess a valid ITI certificate in the relevant trade are eligible to apply.



Interested and eligible applicants can submit their online application through the official website www.rrc-wr.com.



The online application process for Western Railway Recruitment 2026 has already commenced through the official RRC Western Railway portal. Interested and eligible candidates can submit their application form in online mode only. The last date to apply is 23 March 2026, and no application will be accepted after the closing date under any circumstances.



Applicants are strongly advised to complete the registration and fee payment well before the deadline to avoid last-minute technical issues such as heavy website traffic, server errors or payment failure. Candidates should also verify all the details entered in the application form carefully before final submission, as correction may not be allowed after the final submission of the form.



After successful submission, candidates must download and keep a printout of the application form and payment receipt for future reference during the document verification process.



Western Railway Vacancy 2026 – Overview



ParticularsDetailsOrganizationWestern Railway VacancyPost NameApprenticeAdvertisement No.RRC/WR/04/2025Total Vacancies5349Qualification10th + ITIAge Limit15–24 YearsNotification Date18 February 2026Start Date to Apply21 February 2026Last Date to Apply23 March 2026Application ModeOnlineJob TypeApprenticeship (Contract)Official Websitewww.rrc-wr.com



Western Railway Recruitment 2026 – Trade-wise Posts



TradeVacanciesFitter1614Electrician1217Welder532PASAA280Electronic Mechanic236Mechanic (Diesel)207Painter190Carpenter184Refrigerator (AC Mechanic)184Pipe Fitter176Plumber136Wireman126Draftsman (Civil)87Turner75Stenographer40Machinist (Grinder)25Forger & Heat Treater16Machinist14Mechanic Motor Vehicle10Total5349



Eligibility Criteria




10th Class (Matriculation) under 10+2 system with minimum 50% aggregate marks



Must possess ITI certificate in the relevant trade from recognized institute




Trade-wise ITI Requirement



Candidates must have ITI certification in respective trades such as:




Fitter – ITI in Fitter



Electrician – ITI in Electrician



Welder – ITI in Welder



COPA/PASAA – ITI in Computer Operator & Programming Assistant



Diesel Mechanic – ITI in Diesel Mechanic



Draftsman (Civil) – ITI in Draftsman (Civil)



And others as per notification




Age Limit (As per Notification)




Minimum Age: 15 Years



Maximum Age: 24 Years




Age Relaxation




SC/ST: 5 Years



OBC: 3 Years



PwBD: 10 Years



Ex-Servicemen: As per Railway rules




Application Fee



CategoryFeeGeneral / OBC₹100SC / ST / PwBD / WomenNo Fee



💳 Payment Mode: Online



Selection Process



✔ Merit-based selection✔ No written test or interview



Selection will be based on:




Average percentage of marks in 10th + ITI



Equal weightage to both qualifications




📌 In case of tie:




Older candidate will be preferred



If DOB same, candidate who passed 10th earlier will be preferred




Stipend



Selected apprentices will undergo 1-year training and receive stipend as per:




Railway Board rules



Apprentices Act guidelines




Important Dates



EventDateNotification Release18 February 2026Start of Online Application21 February 2026Last Date to Apply23 March 2026



How to Apply for Western Railway Vacancy 2026



Follow these steps:




Visit www.rrc-wr.com



Click on Western Railway Apprentice Recruitment 2026



Register and fill in application form



Upload photograph, signature & required certificates



Pay application fee (if applicable)



Review and submit application



Download and save confirmation copy







Download Official Notification PDF



Download









Official Website for Apply



Apply Now

				Contact Us			

			
		
			
Welcome to GovtJobWeb. We are always ready to help students and job seekers with any questions, feedback, corrections, or information requests related to Government Job Notifications other educational updates. If you find any mistake in a post, need clarification about a notification, or want to share an official update, you can contact us anytime and we will try our best to assist you.



Email Support : For all queries related to job notifications, reporting errors, collaboration, advertisement, or general support, please email us at: contact@govtjobweb.com. We regularly check our inbox and try to respond to every message.



Location : Ajmer, India. We operate as an online information platform and do not provide in-person services, so please contact us through email only.



Response Time : We generally reply within 24–48 hours on working days. During peak recruitment seasons responses may take slightly longer, but every email is reviewed carefully.



Share Information : If you have any official job notification or educational announcement that may help students, you can send it to us by email. Our team will verify the details from official sources and publish the information as quickly as possible.



Important Notice : GovtJobWeb is not a government organization and is not affiliated with any recruitment board or department. We collect information from official websites, employment news, and publicly available sources only for educational and informational purposes. Users are strongly advised to always verify complete details from the official website of the respective department before applying.



Thank you for visiting GovtJobWeb and trusting us for job updates.

				About us			

			
		
			
About GovtJobWeb



Welcome to GovtJobWeb – Your Trusted Source for Government Job Updates & Educational Information. At GovtJobWeb, we understand how important timely information is for students and job seekers. Whether you are a fresher searching for your first government job, a candidate preparing for competitive exams, or an aspirant waiting for results or admit cards, our platform is created to connect you with the latest opportunities and verified updates.



Our MissionOur mission is to make government job notifications and educational updates simple, accessible, and easy to understand for everyone. We aim to provide clear and reliable information so that no candidate misses an important date, announcement, or career opportunity.



What We ProvideGovtJobWeb is not just an update website; it is an information hub where users can find Latest Government Job Notifications across central and state departments, Admit Cards, Answer Keys, Results and Merit Lists, Exam Schedules and Important Dates, Syllabus and Exam Pattern details, Admission and Counseling Updates, and other important educational announcements.



Why Trust GovtJobWebWe focus on accuracy and clarity. Our team regularly monitors official government websites, recruitment boards, and public notifications to publish updates as early as possible. We present information in a simple and organized format so users can quickly understand eligibility, important dates, and application procedures. Our website is optimized for both mobile and desktop to ensure fast and easy access for all visitors.



Our VisionOur vision is to help every student and job aspirant stay informed and confident while preparing for their future. We want to simplify the job search process and provide a reliable platform where candidates can easily access authentic information and plan their career path.



Connect With UsWe value our users and their feedback. If you have suggestions, corrections, or queries regarding any update, you may contact us anytime.



Email: contact@govtjobweb.com



GovtJobWeb – Stay Updated, Stay Prepared, Build Your Future.

				Privacy Policy			

			
		
			
Who we are


Suggested text: Our website address is: https://govtjobweb.com.


Comments


Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.


An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.


Media


Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.


Cookies


Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.


If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.


When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.


If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.


Embedded content from other websites


Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.


These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.


Who we share your data with


Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.


How long we retain your data


Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.


For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.


What rights you have over your data


Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.


Where your data is sent


Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.
